abstracts.cdata!:
The water supply component would
            comprise the following: (a) extensions of the Komolac
            pumping station and installation of two additional pumps;
            (b) new 1.4 km rising main from the pumping station to the
            tunnel through Srdj Mountain; (c) construction of a 2,000
